headline: Here’s What is Powering Merck & Co.’s (MRK) Earnings Growth
summary: GreensKeeper Asset Management, an investment management company, released its third quarter investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The Value Fund appreciated +4.7% (net) in the third quarter, +16.7% year to date and +24.4% over the past twelve months, however, the US dollar lowered returns by about -1.1% in Q3. The […]
